Package lejos.hardware.sensor

Access to all the sensors that are supported on the EV3.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EV3SensorConstants Basic constants for use when accessing EV3 Sensors.
SensorConstants Constants used to set Sensor types and modes.
SensorMode  
SensorModes Provide access to the modes supported by a sensor
 

Class Summary
AnalogSensor Base class for analog sensor drivers
BaseSensor  
CruizcoreGyro This Class manages the Micro Infinity Cruizcore XG1300L
DexterCompassSensor Driver for the Dexter Industries compass sensor.
DexterGPSSensor Class for controlling dGPS sensor from Dexter Industries.
DexterIMUSensor Represents the Dexter Industries dIMU sensor.
The IMU sensor provider acceleration (m/s), rate (degrees/sec) and temperature (Celcius) data.
DexterLaserSensor This class represents a Dexter Industries Laser Sensor.
DexterPressureSensor250 Support for Dexter Industries DPressure250 Not tested.
DexterPressureSensor500 Support for Dexter Industries DPressure500 Not tested.
DexterThermalIRSensor Support for the Dexter Industries Thermal Infrared Sensor.
EV3ColorSensor Basic sensor driver for the Lego EV3 color sensor
TODO: Add extra methods to make it more compatible with the NXT, check SWITCH_DELAY TODO: RGB mode seems to cause the sensor to crash!
EV3GyroSensor Sensor driver for the Lego EV3 Gyro sensor.
Please note that the Gyro sensor that the sensor can supply both rate and angle.
EV3IRSensor Basic sensor driver for the Lego EV3 Infra Red sensor.
TODO: Need to implement other modes.
EV3TouchSensor Basic sensor driver for the Lego EV3 Touch sensor
EV3UltrasonicSensor Sensor driver for the Lego EV3 Ultrasonic sensor.
HiTechnicAccelerometer Class to access the HiTechnic NXT Acceleration / Tilt Sensor (NAC1040).
HiTechnicAngleSensor Supports the angle sensor of HiTechnic.
HiTechnicBarometer This class supports the HiTechnic barometric sensor.
HiTechnicColorSensor HiTechnic color sensor.
www.hitechnic.com This class does support HiTechnic Color Sensor V2.
HiTechnicCompass This class supports the HiTechnic compass sensor.
HiTechnicEOPD Supports HiTechnics EOPD (Electro Optical Proximity Detector) sensor.
This sensor is used to detect objects and small changes in distance to a target.
HiTechnicGyro Support the HiTechnic Gyro sensor NGY1044 (or equivalent).
HiTechnicIRSeeker HiTechnic IRSeeker sensor - untested.
HiTechnicIRSeekerV2 HiTechnic IRSeeker v2 See http://www.hitechnic.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=NSK1042
HiTechnicMagneticSensor Support for HiTechnic Magnetic sensor See http://www.hitechnic.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=NMS1035
I2CSensor Class that implements common methods for all I2C sensors.
MindsensorsAbsoluteIMU This class implements the standard leJOS sensor interface for the Mindsensors AbsoluteIMU family of sensors.
See: Mindsensors.com
The information used for this device is based on Mindsensors IMU user guide
MindsensorsAccelerometer This class works with the Mindsensors acceleration (tilt) sensor ACCL-Nx-v2/v3.
MindsensorsBTSense Support for the Mindsensors BTSense application
MindsensorsCompass This class supports the Mindsensors compass sensor.
MindsensorsDistanceSensor Supports Mindsensors DIST-Nx series of Optical Distance Sensor.
This sensor is used for greater precision than the Ultrasonic Sensor.
See http://www.mindsensors.com/index.php?module=pagemaster&PAGE_user_op=view_page&PAGE_id=73
MindsensorsLightSensorArray This class manages the sensor NXT Line Leader from Mindsensors.
MindsensorsLineLeader This class manages the sensor NXT Line Leader from Mindsensors.
MindSensorsPressureSensor This class support the Digital Pneumatic Pressure Sensor (PPS58-Nx) by MindSensors.
NXTColorSensor LEGO NXT Color Sensor driver.
NXTLightSensor This class is used to obtain readings from a LEGO NXT light sensor.
NXTSoundSensor Abstraction for a NXT sound sensor.
NXTTouchSensor Abstraction for a NXT touch sensor.
NXTUltrasonicSensor Represent the UltraSonic sensor for the NXT.
RCXLightSensor This class is used to obtain readings from a legacy RCX light sensor, using an adapter cable to connect it to the NXT brick.
RCXRotationSensor Provide access to the Lego RCX Rotation Sensor.
RCXThermometer Abstraction for an RCX temperature sensor.
RFIDSensor Support for the Codatex RFID Sensor.
SumoEyesSensor Java class for MINDSENSORS NXT SumoEyes (triple zone IR obstacle detector).
UARTSensor Base class for EV3 UART based sensors.
 

Package lejos.hardware.sensor Description

Access to all the sensors that are supported on the EV3. Devices that are not strictly sensors are in lejos.hardwae.devie.
